item.title: Tailscale with Headscale?
item.description: Last month, I got a Dell R730xd. And pay many time on Fight with ChinaTelecom. Finally, I lost in this war. But fortunately, Tailscale can effectively(maybe) address my issue. I used Tailscale past, but stopped by Chinese ‘Premium’ Network, high latency and loss make me crazy. And ’they’ provides services, just like Google. Haha, actually, I’m not sensitive to this at all. I’m not a privacy-paranoid person. “Why not selfhost it?

item.title: Bluetooth Pairing on Dual Boot
item.description: Edit pairing keys on Windows and Linux, make they are consistent
